x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Students in schools and colleges face growing mental health challenges, including stress, anxiety, social isolation, and burnout. Despite increasing awareness, access to mental well-being support remains inconsistent, often reactive rather than proactive. Institutions lack integrated systems to identify at-risk students early, connect them to counsellors or resources, and monitor well-being trends over time.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: Mind Space : A ServiceNow Powered Student Wellbeing & Support Platform
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Mind Space leverages ServiceNow’s workflow automation and AI to support student mental health through a unified platform.

  • Student Wellbeing Portal: Mobile-friendly interface for daily mood check-ins, journaling, and easy access to support or counseling appointments.

  • Counsellor Dashboard: Uses Performance Analytics to visualise well-being trends and automate follow-ups or escalations.

  • AI-Assisted Triage (Now Assist): Employs NLU to detect emotional tone in journal entries and trigger counselor review when risk indicators arise.

  • Community Support Module: Enables secure peer support groups and integrates with Microsoft Teams or Slack for wellbeing sessions.

ServiceNow Capabilities are going to be utilised 

  • ServiceNow HR Service Delivery (HRSD): Case and knowledge management for counseling interactions.

  • Service Portal / Next Experience UI: Student-facing wellbeing portal.

  • Performance Analytics & Reporting: Wellbeing metrics and insights for school administrators.

  • Now Assist / NLU: Sentiment and keyword detection in student input.

  • IntegrationHub: Integration with external mental health APIs or chat platforms.

  • Flow Designer: Automated routing and escalation workflows.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Secure integration with third-party counseling systems or telehealth APIs.

  • Compliance with student data privacy standards (GDPR).

  • Availability of ServiceNow HRSD or CSM licenses.

  • Optionally, Microsoft Teams or Google Workspace integration.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring data privacy and confidentiality of student well-being data.

  • Building trust and adoption among students and staff.

  • Integrating with diverse campus systems (email, identity providers).

  • Designing non-intrusive wellbeing check-ins that encourage honest participation.
